title: FINAL FANTASY® XIII

gpu: X.Org Radeon RX Vega (VEGA10, DRM 3.27.0, 4.19.0-041900rc6-generic, LLVM 8.0.0)
notes: When launching the game there is a .net installation and then nothing happens, the game won't start. Tried different Proton launch options but it did not make any difference.
title: FINAL FANTASY® XIII

notes: The game requires a lib that only works in 32-bit prefixes, which proton currently does not support.
title: FINAL FANTASY® XIII

notes: I got it working by changing the prefix to windows xp so that .net can install. The .net install takes a very long time (about 20-25 minutes) .  The game runs well but has some stutters. The main problem left is that my xbox 360 controller kept freezing up, I could get it to work again by pressing both shoulder buttons and both triggers simultaneously several times but it's very annoying.
title: FINAL FANTASY® XIII
